The Routing Loop - New Time Slot!

Wednesday's 11:00AM-12:00PM PST / 2:00PM-3:00PM EST / 7:00PM-8:00PM GMT

Twitch/AWS

1 February 2024

re:Invent 2023 Chalk Talk - Connecting and securing services with Amazon VPC Lattice

Hosts:
Riggs Goodman III

Guests:
Justin Davies, Principal Product Manager
Satish Katpally, Principal Networking Specialist
Jamie Wenzel, Principal Solutions Architect ELB

Abstract:
Amazon VPC Lattice helps you connect your applications and services securely and simplifies the way microservices communicate in a multi-account and multi-virtual private cloud (VPC) environment. In this chalk talk, learn how you can connect your Amazon EC2, Amazon EKS, Amazon ECS, or AWS Lambda microservices whether they are on AWS or on premises. Explore common use cases like multiple account/VPC connectivity, service-to-service authentication and authorization, load balancing, blue-green/canary deployments, and more. Bring your questions.
